reporter_caption.center: 401 FOURTH STREET v. INVESTORS INS. GROUP, 576 Pa. 713 (2003)

caption.center: 401 FOURTH STREET, INC., Respondent v. INVESTORS INSURANCE GROUP,

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 363 MAL 2003, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 2nd day of December, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby granted.
